channel.title: I keep posting my server on the status page, but it keeps deleting itself?
channel.description: Everytime I post it, it stays on for about 2 hours, then its gone. I don't know how to keep it up there. Somebody please help?

item.title: I keep posting my server on the status page, but it keeps deleting itself?
item.dc:creator: @Kingen50cent Kingen50cent
item.description:
@Kingen50cent wrote:

First time i posted mine it got deleted only once but when i got it 24/7 it stopped. idk but it sounds strange

Read full topic
